A silver-haired kung-fu bad guy groups with some ruthless fighters to get their hands on the 36 Deadly Styles Manual, a martial arts handbook that could upset the balance of the World of Martial Arts.
 When young Wah Jee learns that these brigands are the same ones that killed his father, he's drawn into the conflict. There's only one course of action: for Wah Jee to learn the 36 Deadly Styles himself, and take on the bad guys to gain revenge for his father...
